page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: There are several groups which meet in Billingborough and Horbling.The Wednesday club have monthly meetings when the ladies have talks and demonstrations.The Sunshine club for pensioners meets weekly and organises outings.The Scout and Guide movement is well supported. The Village Hall is the main centre for indoor recreation. The playgroup and Youth club meet there.Discos, whist drives,Country and Western evenings, Bingo and the Theatrical Society performances all take place there.There is a playing field with facilities for tennis ,bowls cricket and football. A children's play area is also here. There are three public houses and the fireman's social club with various games facilities.
